coreAttributes.name: Chicken Pot Pie
coreAttributes.description: A small tin containing a pie with a mix of vegetables and meat. While plenty of omnivorous races enjoy the taste of these pies, they are a particular favourite of fox-morphs.
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
[##npc.incrementHealth(npc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_HEALTH_MAXIMUM)/10)]

[npc.Name] [npc.verb(start)] to feel a lot more energetic...

[#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_MAJOR_PHYSIQUE, 2)]

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(take)] the Chicken Pot Pie out of its tin, before bringing it up to [npc.her] mouth and taking a bite. [npc.She] [npc.verb(find)] that its delicious, nutritious mix of vegetables and meat is easy to chew through, and [npc.she] swiftly [npc.verb(consume)] the entire thing.
